config: Did You Know Accidents and Crimes Increase Around the Holidays?

Data shows an unfortunate uptick in serious and fatal motor vehicle accidents around the 4th of July holiday. 40%* of fatal crashes are a DUI or alcohol-involved incident. While we hope everyone has a safe holiday weekend, increasing your PPC budget can help you to maximize your reach to connect with people who will need your services.
